entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
